boardgame.name: Koryŏ
Spiskowcy
Корё
고려
boardgame.description: Koryŏ is a game based on an uchronian and politico-steampunk universe._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each turn, players simultaneously choose a family of politician from their hand, and play as many cards of this family as they have and wish to. Each family has a value ranging from 1 to 9, which indicates both the number of cards in the family and the number of victory points the player controlling this family will score at the end of the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A game lasts exactly eight turns, and on each turn a family grants its specific power to the player controlling it. Thus, efficient handling of these powers is the key to success! While their influence increases turn by turn due to the number of authorized cards in their council, the number of cards drawn each turn dwindles, making choices all the more difficult._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

KORYO: $19.95 Asmodee Editions [ASMKOR0] SHIPPING Continental U.S. - $13.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - TBD

Very good condition, only played once. Rules in English, French and Korean Payment options: Paypal or bank transfer Shipping costs Without insurance and tracking: Germany: 4,30 € Rest of Europe: 8,90 € Including insurance and tracking: Germany: 6,90 € Rest of Europe: 16,90 €

Asmodee (ASMKOR01) Play cards to control a majority and hold sway over the factions of Kory?. Short-term decisions mean long-term gain in this fast and exciting card game of politics and betrayal. Players will play cards to maintain majorities of specific factions, and in so doing gain the powers provided by their followers. Control the bankers to grab influence now, or take over the guardians to protect yourself from the barbarians. Every decision is tricky, as you jockey to maintain majorities and hold the most power.
